Text: Hopefully this is better than the first issue.
I didn't get past the first page. I really can't stand the art and I'm not a fan of Simone's writing.
i actually like this series quite a bit. also, the return of a wildstorm character (i'm not even a huge fan of wildstorm) was a nice touch, IMHO.
You guys are crazy... This is one of the better comics DC is putting out. I'm excited about this comic.
